metadata.title: CVE-2017-2816 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An exploitable buffer overflow vulnerability exists in the tag parsingfunctionality of LibOFX 0.9.11. A specially crafted OFX file can cause awrite out of bounds resulting in a buffer overflow on the stack. Anattacker can construct a malicious OFX file to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: libofx: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
